planning.lockedTitle: Planning not available with the Essential plan

properties.title: Properties
properties.subtitle: Real estate portfolio management

properties.propertiesDescription: Properties allow you to manage your real estate portfolio and track maintenance and cleaning interventions.

properties.passwordHelper: A secure password will be automatically generated (8+ characters)

priceEstimation.title: Price estimation
priceEstimation.noEstimation: Fill in characteristics to get an estimate

properties.cleaningEstimateTooltip: Indicative estimate for the cleaning intervention cost. Final pricing is subject to the service provider's acceptance.
properties.cleaningDurationTooltip: Estimated cleaning intervention duration based on property characteristics. Actual duration may vary.

serviceRequests.title: Service Requests

serviceRequests.confirmValidation: Do you want to validate the request "{{title}}" and create an intervention?
serviceRequests.validateAndCreateInterventionDescription: An intervention will be automatically created. You can optionally assign a team or user.
serviceRequests.validateSuccess: The request "{{title}}" has been successfully validated and an intervention has been created.
serviceRequests.approvedCannotEdit: This service request has been approved and can no longer be modified. An intervention has been automatically created.
serviceRequests.noPermissionEdit: You do not have the necessary permissions to modify service requests.
